data.text: @NPRGoatsandSoda @NPR Requoting your own lies is not going to sell this story.

@NPRGoatsandSoda If you follow this discussion to it's conclusion no evidence could be given that the lineages didn't originate in humans.  Would like to see more back & forth on this.  As it stands now the papers change nothing in the lab vs zoo debate.   
https://t.co/4sJPz8uBJB
@NPRGoatsandSoda The phrase "strongest evidence" tells that they are lying.
